title: Calibiri Bold or Myriad Pro Linotype
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061847im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4_5058.jpg)

Hello Every,

Kindly advice that word PRYSTINE has hole on the top, what kind of font it is as in normal condition (without the hole) the font is mentioned in the title.

Thanks  
REgards,  
Hash

Font: 

 Myriad 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061847/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: hasnain125

comments.content:
Thanks Ryuk.

for the suggestion, though I am looking for the holes on the top like nails or something.  
kindly look the picture in detail again.

Thanks

The font is Myriad.  
The "holes" have been added by the graphic designer who designed the sign - they are not part of the font.
